meta.title: Social Security Benefits & Financial Support | Barringtons
meta.description: Guide to bereavement benefits, funeral payments, and financial support available after a death. Help with DWP claims and benefits advice.
meta.keywords: bereavement benefits, funeral payment, DWP benefits, widows pension, social security

intro.title: Financial Support Available
intro.lead_text: There are several benefits available to help with funeral costs and provide financial support after bereavement.

guide_sections.title: Funeral Expenses Payment
guide_sections.description: If you're on certain benefits, you may be able to get help with funeral costs from the DWP.
points: Depends on your relationship to deceased

guide_sections.title: Bereavement Support Payment
guide_sections.description: For those whose spouse or civil partner died on or after 6 April 2017.
points: Monthly payments for up to 18 months

cta_section.title: Need Help with Claims?
cta_section.description: We can provide guidance on available benefits and help you understand what you may be entitled to.
